billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Prohibits the granting of off-premises consumption liquor licenses within 350 feet of a school
summary: Extends the zone around a school, church, synagogue or place of worship, in which no premises may be granted a retail license to sell liquor and/or wine for off-premises consumption, from two hundred feet to three hundred fifty feet on the same street.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law, in relation to licenses to sell liquor for off-premises consumption near schools
